meanings.definition: To delay or be slow in acting or moving.
meanings.sent1: She always tarriest when it's time to leave for school.
meanings.sent2: Don't tarriest, we need to catch the bus!
meanings.sent3: The turtle was the tarriest creature in the race.
meanings.sent4: His decision to tarriest cost him the opportunity.
meanings.sent5: The snail moved at the tarriest pace imaginable.

meanings.definition: The act of delaying or being slow in acting or moving.
meanings.sent1: His constant tarriest frustrated everyone waiting for him.
meanings.sent2: The tarriest of the group caused the event to start late.
meanings.sent3: The tarriest of all the animals was the sloth.
meanings.sent4: The tarriest of moments was waiting for the results.
meanings.sent5: The traffic jam was the tarriest I had ever experienced.
